useCase.name: Process of creating GitHub accounts and repositories for teachers and students
useCase.description: In this process, a teacher requests an account, creates a public repository, approves a student's request to be a collaborator, while the student requests an account, creates a private repository, and sends a request to the teacher to be added as a collaborator.

mainSequence.step: Teacher applies for a GitHub account
Student applies for a GitHub account
Teacher creates a public repository TeacherRepo
Student creates a private repository StudentRepo
Student sends a request email to the teacher to become a collaborator of StudentRepo
Teacher approves the requests and becomes a collaborator of StudentRepo (bulk approval)
